div.p: The currently distributed version of Vestigo targets early adopters as some aspects of the software and documentation are subject to frequent change over the next couple of weeks. The areas where Vestigo is still improved are listed on this site.
div.h3: UI and behaviour of the standalone application

div.p: The standalone version of Vestigo is based on the Eclipse-IDE and currently it is not yet stripped down to include only the functionality of Vestigo. This means that the not only the download of the standalone version is very large, but also that you will get a complete Eclipse-IDE instead of only the JDO/JPA browser.

Additionally the standalone version needs to behave a little different than the Eclipse plug-in. For example the standalone-version should be able to manage queries directly in the file-system while the Eclipse plug-in restricts the query management to the Eclipse workspace.
There is still some documentation missing on the website that helps users to use Vestigo.
